description: You can now mount your iPad , or other 10-Inch tablet, to a wall, under a cabinet, to a desk or table, or anywhere you like with this Universal Tablet Under Cabinet, Wall, and Desk Mount.. This mount provides you the flexibility to fit a variety of large-sized tablets, including all the Apple iPad models as well as any other 9.7 to 10-Inch tablets. The mount provides full rotation, tilt, and angular adjustment flexibility, so you can position your iPad in the perfect position. The base is secured to a flat surface using two screws. The bracket is designed for easy and quick installation and removal of the tablet, so your iPad can continue to travel with you where ever you go.
title: Mount-it! MI-1401 TV Wall Mount, Black
